snippet: Energy, materials and financial companies lost ground on a day when the central bank released the minutes from its March meeting.
abstract: Stocks fall, with the Standard & Poor's 500-stock index retreating from four-year highs following Federal Reserve announcement that it is less inclined to proved more economic stimulus.
lead_paragraph: Energy, materials and financial companies lost ground on a day when the central bank released the minutes from its March meeting.

headline.seo: Stimulus Outlook Wanes, and Shares Turn Down
headline.main: Stimulus Outlook Wanes, and Shares Turn Down
headline.print_headline: Stimulus Outlook Wanes, And Shares Turn Down
